gen

Class Hyperparam

  • java.lang.Object
    • gen.Hyperparam
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    IntHyperparam

    public class Hyperparam
extends Object
    This class is used to represent a hyperparameter used in the generation pipeline. For a list of all hyperparams, see Hyperparams. For further details on hyperparameter optimization, refer to section "Hyperparameter Optimization" of the thesis.

    • Method Detail

      • realize

        public double realize()
        Returns:
        the current realization of the hyperparameter or a new random realization if REALIZE_RANDOM = true

      • stepSize

        protected double stepSize()

      • updateRandom

        public static void updateRandom(boolean newBestScore)
        Updates the localized hyperparameter optimization procedure by setting a new random value for at least MIN_PARAMS_TO_UPDATE and at most MAX_PARAMS_TO_UPDATE hyperparameters; the actual number of updated hyperparameters is chosen randomly.
        Parameters:
        newBestScore - whether the previous random update achieved a new best score

      • updateRandom

        public static void updateRandom(List<Hyperparam> hyperparams,
                                double r,
                                boolean newBestScore)
        Updates the localized hyperparameter optimization procedure by setting a new random value for at least MIN_PARAMS_TO_UPDATE and at most MAX_PARAMS_TO_UPDATE hyperparameters from a given list. The actual number of updated hyperparameters is chosen randomly and the new value is in the range [(1-r) * defaultValue, (1+r) * defaultValue].
        Parameters:
        hyperparams - the list of hyperparams
        r - the range parameter
        newBestScore - whether the previous random update achieved a new best score

      • update

        public static boolean update(boolean valueGivesNewBest)
        Updates the localized hyperparameter optimization procedure by setting a new value for the currently considered hyperparameter allParams.get(currentParam).
        Parameters:
        valueGivesNewBest - whether the previous value achieved a new best score
        Returns:
        whether all possible values for the current parameter have been tried

      • printDebug

        public static void printDebug()
        prints the current assignment to all hyperparameters, i.e. the list (theta_1, ..., theta_n)

      • allToString

        public static String allToString()
        returns the current assignment to all hyperparameters, i.e. the list (theta_1, ..., theta_n), as a string.

      • initializeFromFile

        public static void initializeFromFile(String filename)
                               throws IOException
        Initializes all hyperparameters from a file which contains the values for all hyperparameters, separated by semicolons. If multiple such entries are found in the file (i.e. it contains more than one line), the parameters written in the very last line are assumed to be the most up to date ones.
        Parameters:
        filename - a file containing one or multiple newline-separated strings as required by initializeFromString(String)
        Throws:
        IOException

      • initializeFromString

        public static void initializeFromString(String desc)
        Initializes all hyperparameters from a string similar to the one returned by printDebug().
        Parameters:
        desc - A string describing all hyperparameters of the form (val_1; val_2; ...; val_n; )
